message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. What do you say?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $120 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but $120 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $140, which is still a fair price for both of us. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $130 for the product. I hope this will be acceptable.
